ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 328
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Tim, I will add that to my list as well...I may head over that way this weekend.
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Tim, I will add that to my list as well...I may head over that way
this weekend.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Henson [mailto:rags@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, November 15, 2000 8:51 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 328
>
>
> I suggest going to overthere. If you hunt on the west side of the outpost
> everything will be blue and yellow to you. It's a great place to solo, not
> many people camp there. I went from 20 to 22 in just a few hours.
>
> Have fun!
>
> Lalandra Darkseed
> Tunare Server
>
> From: "Howler" <howler@...>
> Subject:
>
> Hello all!
>
> I am currently level 20 and I am hunting Gorge Hounds in EK. Are there any
> suggestions as to where and what I should be hunting to level somewhat
> quickly. Speed is NOT of the essence, I guess I am looking for a somewhat
> safe yet efficient spot.
>
> Thanks in Advance
> Nefrit -
> Bristlebane
>
>
>
